text: Piet Huyg (19 March 1951 â€“ 6 December 2019) was a Dutch footballer. He played as a defender. He played 349 games with HFC Haarlem, mostly in the Dutch Eerste Divisie. Huyg died on 6 December 2019 at the age of 68 of Alzheimer's disease. == References == Category:1951 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Dutch footballers Category:Sportspeople from North Holland
title: Piet Huyg
